text: Pērse is a right tributary to the river Daugava in Latvia, flowing through Ērgļi, Pļaviņas and Koknese municipalities. The river crosses roads A6, P79, P80 and Riga - Krustpils railway line. The river begins in Kārdeces forest in Sausnēja parish. ==References== == External links == * Category:Rivers of Latvia
title: Pērse
